GSD.product_version: versions from v3.17 to before v4.19.238
GSD.description:
irqchip/gic-v3: Fix GICR_CTLR.RWP polling

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.238 by commit c7daf1b4ad809692d5c26f33c02ed8a031066548, it was introduced in version v3.17 by commit 021f653791ad17e03f98aaa7fb933816ae16f161. For more details please see the references link.
